parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A spongy brake pedal can lead to extended stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
especially in the morning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: ABS system failure can cause extended stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The ABS system fails
resulting in extended stopping distances
warning lights on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake line failure can cause complete brake failure, leading to accidents.
symptoms: Brake line or hose breaks
causing brake failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system, particularly when cold, can cause the vehicle to be difficult to steer, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The power steering is difficult to turn
the steering wheel feels stiff
the vehicle is hard to maneuver
especially when the engine is cold.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion can cause the vehicle to lose steering control, leading to accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels loose or wobbly
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering is difficult or uneven
the vehicle makes unusual noises while steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering belt tensioner can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering belt breaks or fails
the power steering system fails
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle makes unusual noises while steering.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of ball joints can cause the vehicle to lose traction, wander, or vibrate while driving, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle fails state safety inspections
the vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
the vehicle vibrates or shakes while driving
the vehicle loses traction at high speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of front struts or shock absorbers can cause the vehicle to lose traction, wander, or vibrate while driving, leading to a loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle wanders or drifts while driving
the vehicle vibrates or shakes while driving
the vehicle loses traction at high speeds
the vehicle exhibits excessive bouncing or swaying.
